column3: What is your full name (as you’d like it displayed on your portfolio)?
column4: What is your preferred email address for professional contact?
column5: Do you want your phone number included on the site? If yes, please provide it.
column6: What is the main purpose of your portfolio blog?
column7: What kind of jobs or clients are you aiming to attract with this blog?
column9: What specific goals do you want to achieve in the next 6 months with this blog?
column10: Do you already have writing samples prepared for the portfolio?
column11: How many writing samples do you want to feature initially?
column12: Do you want your samples to be view-only, downloadable, or both?
column14: Do you have preferred colors or a theme in mind?
column15: Are there any websites you admire that could inspire your design? Please list links.
column16: Do you have a personal logo, headshot, or brand materials you’d like included?
column17: Would you like a blog section to share new posts regularly?
column18: Should your posts have categories/tags to organize content?
column19: Do you want visitors to be able to comment on your posts?
column20: Would you like a “Hire Me” or “Work With Me” call-to-action button?
column21: Would you like an “About Me” section? If yes, what key points should it include?
column22: Should your resume/CV be available for download?
column23: Would you like to display testimonials or recommendations from past clients/employers?
column24: Do you want a contact form for inquiries?
column25: Do you already own a domain name? If yes, what is it?
column26: Do you want training on how to update and maintain your site by yourself?
column27: Do you want newsletter signup functionality?
column28: Would you like your social media accounts (LinkedIn, Twitter/X, Medium, etc.) linked?
column29: Do you need SEO optimization so recruiters can easily find you online?
column30: Are there any must-have features you want included?
column31: Are there any features you definitely do NOT want on your site?
column32: Do you have any other special instructions, ideas, or vision you’d like me to know?

column6: showcasing writing skills;attracting job offers;personal branding;networking

column9: I want to post blogs at least once each week. I want to showcase my work to potential clients who need to see some blogs that I have done in the past. I also want to bring traffic in the blog by creating SEO content

column12: I only want them view only
